PersonalStatement.text: Daniel Salinas, born on 1977-06-04, is a Male based in Xavierton, Puerto Rico. He is Single and holds Nepalese nationality. Currently working at Donaldson PLC.

WorkExperience.text: Financial Analyst at Lopez, Martinez and Crosby from 2014 to 2019.
Senior Data Analyst at Donaldson PLC, 2022 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Mississippi State University
Master's in Engineering from National Cheng Kung University (NCKU)

PersonalSkills.text: Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys gardening.
